meta.author: Karl L. Hughes

data.name: Sciwork 2020
data.description:
Sciwork is a conference to share and discuss computer code for scientific,
numerical, and engineering work. We will focus on source code, and encourage
attendees to share open-source work for both scientific researches and
technical applications.

relatedRecords.name: 2º GDG Community Talk
relatedRecords.description: GDG Community Talk Agora é a sua vez de falar! O evento GDG Community Talk tem o objetivo de convidar as pessoas da comunidade de Toledo para falar sobre tecnologia. relatedRecords.name: Seattle GNU/Linux (aka SeaGL)
relatedRecords.description: SeaGL is a grassroots technical conference dedicated to spreading awareness and knowledge about the GNU/Linux community and free/libre/open-source software/hardware.
